message: Accept my generous offer and we can call it a day!
Take a reasonable offer and let's end this quickly!
Take it or leave it, I'm not getting any younger!
You're not getting any younger either, let's make a deal!
Last chance, Bob! Take it or leave it!
You're not being very generous, Alice. I'll take a bit more, thanks!
This is my final offer, take it or walk away!
You're not being very persuasive, Alice. I'll take a bit more, and I'll still be happy!
This is my last stand, Bob. Take it or leave it!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'll take a bit more, and I'll still be reasonable!
This is my last, last stand, Bob. Take it or walk away!
This is my final offer. Take it or we both walk away with nothing!
